name: Moonzarella
description:
CONTROLS: Xbox / Keyboard

A / Z - Booster

X / Shift - Strafe

RB / Space - Shoot

Guide Napoleon through the depths of the moon in search for it's hidden cache of tantalizing cheese!

Sounds by Alex Metcalfe of Waxlimbs, thanks a billion! https://waxlimbs.bandcamp.com/

Title font by NAL: http://www.dafont.com/vermin-vibes-1989.font

This is my drop-dead deadline submission for TOJam12. Apologies for the bugs and oddities! Will probably pick it up and polish it this year.

caw caw,

Vulture Boy
